member.summary: Gets the current instance of the class.

member.name: M:Kentico.Web.Mvc.RouteRegistration.Add(System.Action{Kentico.Web.Mvc.IRouteBuilderProxy})

summary.para: Adds route registration to be executed on route builder supplied in call.

Route registrations are queued and performed on the route builder passed to the method, once the method is called. After being executed, no additional route registrations can be added (i.e. route registration execution must not precede 'use feature' methods calls so that features can add their specific routes).

member.param: Route registration to be executed on the route collection passed to , once it is called.
member.exception: Thrown when has already been called.

member.name: M:Kentico.Web.Mvc.RouteRegistration.Execute(Kentico.Web.Mvc.IRouteBuilderProxy)

summary.para: Executes registration of routes collected via the method into .
Once the registration executes, no more routes can be added.

member.param: Route builder to register routes into.

member.summary:
Returns an object that provides methods to build URLs by calling an URL building of the framework.
This method is intended only to support Kentico infrastructure and is not supposed to be called directly.
member.param: An instance of the class to which the calls will be proxied.
member.returns: An object that proxies calls to methods to build URLs to an object provided by framework.
member.remarks: The returned object builds URLs based on the context of the current request.
